definitions: To resolve or reach an agreement about (an argument or problem).
To adopt a more steady or secure style of life.
To make one's home in a new place.
To come to rest in a comfortable position.
examples: She settles into her new routine.
The family settles in the new town.
He settles his accounts every month.
The dust settles on the furniture.
The baby settles down for a nap.
